ygData.subject: Re: Make poison
ygData.msgSnippet: I m interested too, drop me an etheral message and let me know! Regards
ygData.messageBody:
I'm interested too, drop me an etheral message and let me know!

Regards

>-Rennin of E'Ci
> Trade Council GM
>
>"Z.M. Kulik" wrote:
>
> > From: "Z.M. Kulik" <direhawk@...>
> >
> > BTW..did you know that you dont have to be a rogue to make poison..??

>message

> > (btw. you dont even need vials, and pelts)

>one
